channel.title: FutureScape was good server but now this :( Help Plz
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Im the owner of FutureScape my server was running great, but now this is coming up when i host it. [IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/4336/noooooowtfisthiserrorwg3.png[/img] where the clienthandler: accepted etc is that happens every time someone trys to connect but they dont connect and that thing comes up then after the 5th time exception in thread like completely crashes my server.
Can anyone Help plz its much needed, And will Be Much appreciated.

But i only go his house every 2 weeks[br][size=1]Posted at: September 02, 2006, 03:09:21 PM[/size][hr]So Guys anyone able to Help?..Please its important to me.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 02, 2006, 03:18:17 PM[/size][hr]hmmâ€¦ Its as if someone is logging in with some bot or some shit and its crashing my server how can i ip ban him without knowing his char name?

item.title: FutureScape was good server but now this :( Help Plz
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

if u hav windows xp

go in2 the control panel

then system

then advanced

then performance settings

then advanced

then change

then change the size of ur internal size 2 1356

and the maximum size 2 3072

then click apply

then try running the server again

Read full topic
